question: Can we use canonical on-chain/token-plan unlock events instead of scenario proxy unlocks?
dashboard_location: Sandbox > Onocoy Hook Layer > Unlock Curve > Missing Primary Inputs
metric_used: Required: canonicalUnlockEvents (vesting/contract schedule); current output: buildOnocoyUnlockCurve() scenario proxy
